contentrichtext.text: There are 69 urban settlements in [[Azerbaijan]] with the official status of a [[city]] ({{lang-az| şəhər}}). They are: {{col-begin}} {{col-break}} * [[Agdam]] * [[Agdash, Azerbaijan|Agdash]] * [[Agjabadi]] * [[Agstafa]] * [[Agsu (city)|Agsu]] * [[Astara, Azerbaijan|Astara]] * [[Babek (city)|Babek]] * [[Baku]] (capital) * [[Belokany|Balakən]] * [[Barda, Azerbaijan|Barda]] * [[Beylagan (city)|Beylagan]] * [[Bilasuvar]] * [[Daşkəsən|Dashkasan]] * [[Davachi]] * [[Füzuli |Fuzuli]] * [[Gədəbəy|Gadabay]] * [[Ganja, Azerbaijan|Ganja]] * [[Goranboy (city)|Goranboy]] * [[Goychay (city)|Goychay]] * [[Goygol (city)|Goygol]], formerly Khanlar (Xanlar) * [[Hajigabul]] * [[Imishli (city)|Imishli]] * [[İsmayıllı|Ismailli]] * [[Jabrayil]] * [[Julfa, Azerbaijan (city)|Julfa]] * [[Kalbajar]] * [[Khachmaz (city)|Khachmaz]] * [[Khojavend (town)|Khojavend]] * [[Khyrdalan]] * [[Kurdamir]] * [[Lankaran]] {{col-break}} * [[Lerik, Azerbaijan|Lerik]] * [[Masally]] * [[Mingacevir]] * [[Nakhichevan (city)|Nakhichevan]] * [[Naftalan, Azerbaijan|Naftalan]] * [[Neftçala|Neftchala]] * [[Oğuz|Oguz]] * [[Ordubad (city)|Ordubad]] * [[Qabala]] * [[Qakh (city)|Qakh]] * [[Qazakh]] * [[Quba]] * [[Qubadli]] * [[Qusar (city)|Qusar]] * [[Saatlı (city)|Saatly]] * [[Sabirabad (city)|Sabirabad]] * [[Shakhbuz]] * [[Shaki, Azerbaijan|Shaki]] * [[Şamaxı|Shamakhy]] * [[Şəmkir|Shamkir]] * [[Sharur]] * [[Shirvan]] * [[Siazan]] * [[Sumqayit]] * [[Tərtər|Tartar]] * [[Tovuz, Azerbaijan|Tovuz]] * [[Ucar, Azerbaijan|Ujar]] * [[Yardımlı|Yardimly]] * [[Yevlakh]] * [[Zaqatala (city)|Zaqatala]] * [[Zardab]] {{col-end}} == Most populous Azerbaijani cities == List of ten cities, including the capital [[Baku]] (2,046,000), with the largest populations, according to the 2009 census.<ref>[http://day.az/news/society/164634.html]</ref> {|class=wikitable |- !Rank!![[Azerbaijani language| Azerbaijani]]!!City!!Population!!Image!!Description |- | 1 | Bakı | [[Baku]] | 2,046,000 (2009) | [[File:A view to Baku and it's Boulevard.JPG|150px]] | Capital and largest city in Azerbaijan. The country's economic powerhouse |- | 2 | Gəncə | [[Ganja, Azerbaijan|Ganja]] | 313,000 (2009) | [[File:Ganja street.jpg|150px]] | Second largest city in Azerbaijan |- | 3 | Sumqayıt | [[Sumqayit]] | 310,000 (2009) | [[File:New buildings in Sumgayit.JPG|150px]] | Third largest city & Second largest seaport in Azerbaijan |- | 4 | Mingəçevir | [[Mingachevir]] | 96,000 (2009) | [[File:Mingachevir Az.jpg|150px]] | Mingachevir is a suburban city. |- | 5 | Xırdalan | [[Khirdalan]] | 92,000 (2009) | [[File:Alleya Khirdalan.jpg|150px]] | Khirdalan is a suburban city |- | 6 | Şirvan | [[Shirvan (city)|Shirvan]] | 77,000 (2009) | [[File:Shirvan city.jpg|150px]] | Located along the [[Kura river]] |- | 7 | Şəki | [[Shaki, Azerbaijan|Shaki]] | 63,000 (2009) | [[File:Caravanserai-Sheki.jpg|150px]] | Shaki is a city known for its rich history. |- | 8 | Yevlax | [[Yevlakh]] | 58,000 (2009) | | |- | 9 | Lənkəran | [[Lankaran]] | 50,000 (2009) | [[File:Samovar Lenkoran Azerbaijan.JPG|150px]] | Lankaran is a suburban city |} ==See also== * [[Administrative divisions of Azerbaijan]] * [[List of geographic names of Iranian origin]] * [[List of cities by country]] * [[List of cities in Asia]] * [[List of cities in Europe]] ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Azerbaijan topics}} {{Asia topic|List of cities in}} {{List of cities in Europe}} {{DEFAULTSORT:List Of Cities In Azerbaijan}} [[Category:Populated places in Azerbaijan| ]] [[Category:Lists of cities by country|Azerbaijan, List of cities in]] [[Category:Azerbaijan geography-related lists|Cities in Azerbaijan]] [[Category:Lists of cities in Europe|Azerbaijan]]
